title: DraftKings' Billionaire-Backed Crypto Analytics Firm CoinScan Raises $6.3M
description: The company is backed by Shalom Meckenzie, the largest individual shareholder in sports betting company DraftKings.

title: Optimism Foundation Sells $157M OP Tokens, Citing 'Treasury Management'
description: The foundation behind layer 2 blockchain Optimism has sold 116 million OP tokens ($157 million) to seven separate purchasers, according to an announcement on the Optimism governance website.

title: Final Fantasy VII Rebirth Demo Unveils Enhanced Sephiroth Gameplay

title: Groundbreaking ‘AI in a Box’: Offline Conversational AI with Privacy
description: In a remarkable stride forward in offline conversational AI, the pioneering tech company Useful Sensors has introduced its innovative “AI in a Box” solution. title: Cosmos and Litecoin Experience 15% Bounce Back, Pomerdoge Establishes Foothold in P2E Gaming
description: After weeks of consolidating, the crypto market is finally in a bull market. title: Bitcoin’s Next Move Up Will Be Explosive, Says Crypto Analyst – But There’s a Catch
description:
A closely followed crypto strategist is predicting that Bitcoin (BTC) will undergo one more market correction before making a massive move to the upside. Pseudonymous analyst Credible Crypto tells his 346,700 followers on the social media platform X that Bitcoin will likely dip down to at least the mid-$26,000 level, but remain in an overall upward […]

The post Bitcoin’s Next Move Up Will Be Explosive, Says Crypto Analyst – But There’s a Catch appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
